ee wagema boho dewalawala naga rupa dakala mage hithe nagayin kere bhakthiyak athiwela thiyenawa.ee nisama un aaraksha kirimata mama pelambauna” yanuwen suresh pawasayi.ohuta wayasa 12 di mulma nagaya beragath suresh ee nayi patiya niwese sangawagena uge hasirim ratawa adhyayanaya kara aththeya.kisindu upakaranayak yoda nogena mema wisaghora sarpayin thama dathin allana suresh danata raja nagayan 12 kda, indiyanu nagayin 7000 kda, polangun 1700 k ha karawalun 150 k pamana beragena athi bawa pawasayi.ohuge mema apuru winodanshaya nisa ohu anathuru rasakata muhunapamata da siduwi aththeya.sarpayakuge dashta kirimata lakwu ohuta ek angillak kapa damimata da siduwiya.
